item.description:
Four Tet will be bringing his lush sounds and DJ skills to the Middle East downstairs on Tuesday, May 14th.

The UK born electronic musician has been producing eclectic music for over a decade and has worked with other amazing musicians such as Thom Yorke and Burial.

His set will be bass heavy, a bit dark, a bit ambient, and experimental. He is the master of building moods and creating a vibe with his sets.

Let's meet up at Miracle of Science bar onÂ 321 Mass Ave at 7pm. I'll send everyone my phone number closer to the event.

Put your dancing shoes on.

http://youtu.be/pkdM4sg8W-k

Tickets are $18 (plus fees)

http://www.ticketweb.com/t3/sale/SaleEventDetail?dispatch=loadSelectionData&eventId=3556714&REFERRAL_ID=tmfeed&crosssite=TM_US:1291160:337303
item.name: Four Tet
